Title: BANDED SIDE KICKS / BANDED HIP ABDUCTIONS
Directions: This is a strengthening exercise for the hip abductors in the frontal plane. Lie down on your side with both knees straight and a mini band looped around your legs just above the ankles. Raise the top leg directly to the side without rotating the pelvis or leg forwards or backwards. Go for maximum range and hold the top position for up to 2 seconds before lowering.
Muscles Involved: Glutes (Gluteus Maximus, Gluteus Medius, Gluteus Minimus)
